definitions.meaning: 更喜欢某事物或倾向于选择某事物而非其他
definitions.usage: 指对某人、某事或某物的喜爱或优先选择，通常用于表达个人倾向或偏好，常与介词for搭配。

examples.scene: 在一家咖啡店里，你和朋友正在点单。朋友问你更喜欢喝哪种咖啡，你想表达自己更偏向于拿铁。
examples.chineseIdea: 我想说我更喜欢拿铁，而不是美式咖啡，因为拿铁口感更柔和。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: When it comes to coffee, I usually @ @ @ lattes over Americanos.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: When it comes to coffee, I usually 「have a preference for」 lattes over Americanos.
examples.chineseTranslation: 说到咖啡，我通常「更喜欢」拿铁而不是美式咖啡。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：I more like latte. 纠正：I have a preference for lattes or I prefer lattes.

examples.scene: 在公司会议中，经理询问团队成员对新项目的工作方式有什么倾向。你想表达更倾向于远程工作。
examples.chineseIdea: 我想说相比办公室工作，我更倾向于远程工作，因为它更灵活。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Given the choice, I would @ @ @ remote work due to its flexibility.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Given the choice, I would 「show a preference for」 remote work due to its flexibility.
examples.chineseTranslation: 如果可以选择，我会「更倾向于」远程工作，因为它更灵活。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：I want remote work better. 纠正：I show a preference for remote work or I prefer remote work.

definitions.usage: 指在某些情况下给予某人或某事优先考虑或特殊待遇，常用于正式或法律语境，与介词to搭配。

examples.scene: 在机场办理登机手续时，你注意到航空公司优先为头等舱乘客办理手续。
examples.chineseIdea: 我想表达航空公司优先为头等舱乘客办理登机手续，而不是经济舱乘客。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The airline tends to @ @ @ first-class passengers during check-in.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The airline tends to 「give preference to」 first-class passengers during check-in.
examples.chineseTranslation: 航空公司在办理登机手续时往往「优先考虑」头等舱乘客。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：Airline let first-class passengers first. 纠正：The airline gives preference to first-class passengers.

examples.scene: 在大学招生过程中，招生官讨论是否优先录取本地学生。你想表达本地学生可能会被优先录取。
examples.chineseIdea: 我想说相比外地学生，本地学生可能会被优先考虑。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Local students often @ @ @ out-of-state applicants in the admission process.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Local students often 「receive preference over」 out-of-state applicants in the admission process.
examples.chineseTranslation: 在招生过程中，本地学生通常「优先于」外州申请者。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：Local students have more priority. 纠正：Local students receive preference over others.
